text: The 79th Infantry Division (, 79-ya Pekhotnaya Diviziya) was an infantry formation of the Russian Imperial Army. ==Organization== *1st Brigade **313th Infantry Regiment **314th Infantry Regiment *2nd Brigade **315th Infantry Regiment **316th Infantry Regiment *79th Artillery Brigade ==References== Category:Infantry divisions of the Russian Empire Category:Military units and formations disestablished in 1918
title: 79th Infantry Division (Russian Empire)
